works.description:
On our game review website, we have an article that we originally published on November 9, 2012 under the title "TERA – Take Aim. Take Control. Take Action." Excerpt from article - 
"For once, developer hype delivers exactly what it promises. The very best thing about Tera is the action. No other MMO even comes close to Tera in bringing the pulse-pounding physical intensity of third-person console combat. MMO veterans are all too familiar with games whose combat outcomes depend on computer-generated dice rolls behind the scenes. "
